Cinco de Mayweather
 




Floyd Mayweather has reason to be festive on May 5.  (Getty Images)



    

    

      If there's a rematch, maybe that bout will save boxing. Floyd 
      Mayweather Jr. takes a 12-round split decision over Oscar De La Hoya, 
      winning the WBC 154-pound title -- and drawing 
      boos from a pro-Oscar crowd.

 Street Sense defies odds to win 133rd Kentucky Derby


    

      
      A jockey 
      with no Derby luck, a trainer thinking retirement, a horse battling a 
      Breeders' Cup curse. Slipping to 19th? Big deal for Street Sense, who 
      rallies for all the roses.

 Senators punch ticket to Eastern Conference finals


      Ottawa utilizes a second-period scoring surge and holds 
      off a furious late rally to eliminate New Jersey with a 3-2 victory in 
      Game 5. Up next: The Sabres or Rangers.
